isis.stitle: 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS INTERNATIONAL MODEL ES52-7A AND ESO65-7A 6-PLUS - TROUBLESHOOTING - INTERCHANGEABILITY

svcproc.title: INTERCHANGEABILITY
svcproc.para: All ball bearings, whether manufactured here or abroad, are interchangeable in regard to standardized dimensions, tolerances, and fits. However, for a given shaft size there are standard bearings for light, medium, and heavy duty service.

Numbers and symbols stamped on inner and outer races of bearings designate size and type. Note that the numbering systems of different bearing manufacturers have not been standardized. Consult interchangeable tables and use the proper bearings for replacement parts.
